titles: A proclamation concerning building in, and about London and Westminster
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehal, the sixteenth day of August, 1661, in the thirteenth year our raign.
Instructing citizens to build buildings of brick to reduce fire hazards.
keywords: Building laws --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
